It'll be OK soon%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:03:44.26,0:03:45.93,CHS,,0,0,0,,不好意思%%65292对不起呀%%65281\N{\rENG}Sorry...sorry%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:03:46.77,0:03:49.56,CHS,,0,0,0,,老伯%%65292你这样点灯是点不着的\N{\rENG}Granny, you can't light it up in this way%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:03:50.02,0:03:51.94,CHS,,0,0,0,,你只有油%%65292没有灯芯诶%%65281\N{\rENG}You've just got the oil but you haven't got a lampwick%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:03:52.36,0:03:53.45,CHS,,0,0,0,,我知道\N{\rENG}I know that%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.78,0:03:57.95,CHS,,0,0,0,,可是灯芯不见了%%65292有什么办法呢%%65311\N{\rENG}But I've lost the lampwick I can do nothing about it%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:03:58.29,0:03:59.21,CHS,,0,0,0,,买一根喏\N{\rENG}Buy a new one%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:00.23,0:04:02.97,CHS,,0,0,0,,有道理…\N{\rENG}It's reasonable...%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:03.18,0:04:05.06,CHS,,0,0,0,,姑娘%%65292请问你\N{\rENG}Miss, excuse me%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:05.46,0:04:11.19,CHS,,0,0,0,,如果如来佛祖那盏神灯的灯芯不见了\N{\rENG}if it is the lamp of Buddha%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:11.19,0:04:12.40,CHS,,0,0,0,,上哪去买%%65311\N{\rENG}where to buy a new lampwick for it?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:12.73,0:04:14.20,CHS,,0,0,0,,早知道你有问题%%65292现身吧%%65281\N{\rENG}Show your real image!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:20.92,0:04:24.17,CHS,,0,0,0,,原来是二郎神和南天门的四大天王\N{\rENG}The Four Kings from the Nantian Gate and Erland God%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:24.42,0:04:26.59,CHS,,0,0,0,,紫霞%%65292你跟你姐姐青霞仙子\N{\rENG}Zixia. Your sister Zixia and you%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:26.89,0:04:28.14,CHS,,0,0,0,,原来是佛祖日月明灯里面\N{\rENG}is the lampwick%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:28.43,0:04:29.52,CHS,,0,0,0,,缠在一起的灯芯\N{\rENG}inside the lamp of Buddha%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:29.77,0:04:31.02,CHS,,0,0,0,,你竟然擅自离开天庭\N{\rENG}You left Heaven without permission%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:31.31,0:04:32.19,CHS,,0,0,0,,还到处跟人说\N{\rENG}You told the public that%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:32.48,0:04:34.37,CHS,,0,0,0,,谁能拔出你手中的紫青宝剑\N{\rENG}the one who can pull your Magic Sword out%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:34.46,0:04:35.95,CHS,,0,0,0,,就是你的如意郎君\N{\rENG}is your best love%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:36.22,0:04:37.60,CHS,,0,0,0,,你是神仙怎么能动凡心\N{\rENG}You're an immortal You can't love any ordinary man%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:37.71,0:04:39.86,CHS,,0,0,0,,假如邪魔外道把你的宝剑拔出来\N{\rENG}If a devil pulls your sword out%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:39.91,0:04:41.92,CHS,,0,0,0,,我们仙界岂不是成为笑柄\N{\rENG}we'll become the laughing-stocks%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:42.54,0:04:44.42,CHS,,0,0,0,,神仙也好%%65292妖怪也好\N{\rENG}No matter who he is an immortal or a devil%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:44.67,0:04:46.63,CHS,,0,0,0,,剑只有我跟我的意中人能拔得出\N{\rENG}the sword can only be pulled out by me and my lover%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:47.01,0:04:48.05,CHS,,0,0,0,,就算他是妖怪\N{\rENG}I will stand by him forever%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:48.51,0:04:50.43,CHS,,0,0,0,,我也会一生一世跟着他\N{\rENG}I will stand by him forever%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:50.64,0:04:52.69,CHS,,0,0,0,,如果不能跟我喜欢的人在一起的话\N{\rENG}If I can't be with the one who I love%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:53.48,0:04:55.82,CHS,,0,0,0,,就算让我做玉皇大帝我也不会开心哪\N{\rENG}I won't be happy even if I were Heaven Emperor%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:56.15,0:04:57.07,CHS,,0,0,0,,一派胡言\N{\rENG}How dare you are%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:57.32,0:04:58.41,CHS,,0,0,0,,既然你执迷不悟\N{\rENG}You're this stubborn%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:04:58.66,0:05:00.29,CHS,,0,0,0,,我今天就要替天行道\N{\rENG}I'm gonna kill you%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:05:00.58,0:05:01.87,CHS,,0,0,0,,要你在人间仙界消失\N{\rENG}You're gonna vanish%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:05:02.12,0:05:04.71,CHS,,0,0,0,,只羡鸳鸯不羡仙%%65292消失就消失\N{\rENG}That's fine I don't wanna be a lonely immortal%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:05:04.76,0:05:05.88,CHS,,0,0,0,,放肆%%65281\N{\rENG}Look out!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:19.61,0:06:20.61,CHS,,0,0,0,,不用说%%65281\N{\rENG}No need to say anything%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:20.95,0:06:22.74,CHS,,0,0,0,,这件事谁说出去%%65292我就杀了他%%65281\N{\rENG}I'll kill whoever speaks it out%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:24.37,0:06:25.75,CHS,,0,0,0,,我说了不用再说了\N{\rENG}I've said it's not permitted to speak it out%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:25.96,0:06:26.71,CHS,,0,0,0,,不是啊%%65281\N{\rENG}I wanna tell you%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:26.96,0:06:28.92,CHS,,0,0,0,,你的哮天犬在那边骑着一条母狗\N{\rENG}Your beloved dog is doing that with a bitch%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:29.34,0:06:30.38,CHS,,0,0,0,,连它都动了凡心\N{\rENG}How dare it is!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:30.62,0:06:32.38,CHS,,0,0,0,,今天晚上我就杀了它打牙祭\N{\rENG}Ok, I'll kill it. Let's eat it%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:32.47,0:06:33.39,CHS,,0,0,0,,好啊…\N{\rENG}Ok...%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:33.68,0:06:35.31,CHS,,0,0,0,,我们早就这么想了\N{\rENG}We've decided to do so for a long time%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:06:49.24,0:06:50.33,CHS,,0,0,0,,晶晶\N{\rENG}Jing Jing%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:07:13.08,0:07:14.33,CHS,,0,0,0,,晶晶\N{\rENG}Jing Jing%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:07:14.87,0:07:16.67,CHS,,0,0,0,,怎会这样呢%%65292人呢%%65311\N{\rENG}Jing Jing, where are they?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:07:47.02,0:07:48.02,CHS,,0,0,0,,神仙%%65311\N{\rENG}Immortals?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:07:49.86,0:07:50.95,CHS,,0,0,0,,妖怪%%65311\N{\rENG}Devils%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:07:53.07,0:07:54.12,CHS,,0,0,0,,谢谢%%65281\N{\rENG}Thank you%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:07:56.96,0:07:59.46,CHS,,0,0,0,,盘丝洞不要乱闯\N{\rENG}Please go into the Spider Web Cave%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:00.21,0:08:01.88,CHS,,0,0,0,,盘丝洞%%65311\N{\rENG}Spider Web Cave?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:02.47,0:08:04.76,CHS,,0,0,0,,你以为我看不懂啊%%65311水帘洞嘛%%65281\N{\rENG}Don't cheat me! It is the Waterfall Cave%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:11.07,0:08:14.95,CHS,,0,0,0,,盘丝洞%%65292这个名字也蛮好听的\N{\rENG}Spider Web Cave, what a nice name%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:18.54,0:08:20.46,CHS,,0,0,0,,就叫你盘丝洞吧\N{\rENG}Just call it Spider Web Cave%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:23.22,0:08:24.97,CHS,,0,0,0,,好%%65292我以后就住在这儿\N{\rENG}I live at here%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:25.51,0:08:26.68,CHS,,0,0,0,,慢着\N{\rENG}Hold it%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:35.37,0:08:38.25,CHS,,0,0,0,,我现在郑重宣布\N{\rENG}Listen to me%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:38.25,0:08:40.17,CHS,,0,0,0,,这个山头所有东西都是属于我的\N{\rENG}all things here belong to me!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:40.67,0:08:41.34,CHS,,0,0,0,,包括你在内\N{\rENG}Including you!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:41.71,0:08:42.38,CHS,,0,0,0,,我%%65311\N{\rENG}Me?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:43.37,0:08:44.33,CHS,,0,0,0,,对%%65281\N{\rENG}Yes%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:44.59,0:08:46.39,CHS,,0,0,0,,就像我的骡子一样%%65292给你盖个章\N{\rENG}just like a donkey let me make a mark on you%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:52.02,0:08:53.48,CHS,,0,0,0,,你现在是我的人了\N{\rENG}You're my guy now%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:54.10,0:08:56.15,CHS,,0,0,0,,如果有人欺负你呢%%65292就报我的名字\N{\rENG}Don't scare of anyone Just tell them you know me%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:08:56.28,0:08:58.33,CHS,,0,0,0,,从今天起%%65292我叫盘丝洞大仙\N{\rENG}I'm called Spider Web Immortal now%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:00.17,0:09:01.79,CHS,,0,0,0,,盘丝大仙%%65311\N{\rENG}Spider Web Immortal?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:02.67,0:09:04.09,CHS,,0,0,0,,五百年前%%65311\N{\rENG}500 years ago?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:11.23,0:09:13.27,CHS,,0,0,0,,你没有变成孙悟空托世\N{\rENG}You hasn't turned back into the Monkey King because%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:13.53,0:09:16.45,CHS,,0,0,0,,是因为你还没遇见给你三颗痣的人\N{\rENG}you haven't met the guy who'll give you the 3 birthmarks%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:34.61,0:09:36.40,CHS,,0,0,0,,芝麻开门\N{\rENG}Open the door%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:37.66,0:09:39.28,CHS,,0,0,0,,芝麻关门\N{\rENG}Close the door%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:52.10,0:09:53.52,CHS,,0,0,0,,我不信…\N{\rENG}I can't believe it...%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:53.81,0:09:54.48,CHS,,0,0,0,,我不要当猴子\N{\rENG}I don't wanna be the Monkey King%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:54.77,0:09:56.03,CHS,,0,0,0,,我要去救晶晶\N{\rENG}I have to save Jing Jing%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:57.53,0:09:59.62,CHS,,0,0,0,,拜托你把宝盒还给我\N{\rENG}Give me back the Box%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:09:59.95,0:10:01.62,CHS,,0,0,0,,芝麻开门\N{\rENG}Open the door%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:11.60,0:10:14.65,CHS,,0,0,0,,没道理啊%%65292我明明听到她说芝麻开门哪\N{\rENG}I have heard that she said "open the door"%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:33.02,0:10:34.35,CHS,,0,0,0,,芝麻开门\N{\rENG}Open the door%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:39.86,0:10:40.95,CHS,,0,0,0,,你赖皮\N{\rENG}How dare you are?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:47.17,0:10:49.72,CHS,,0,0,0,,怕了你了%%65292想别的办法\N{\rENG}Let's go there through another way%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:50.01,0:10:50.68,CHS,,0,0,0,,上山\N{\rENG}Be careful%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.19,0:10:57.82,CHS,,0,0,0,,这边\N{\rENG}That way%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:10:57.90,0:10:59.99,CHS,,0,0,0,,芝麻开门\N{\rENG}Open the door%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:01.03,0:11:02.83,CHS,,0,0,0,,谁呀…%%65311\N{\rENG}Who?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:08.09,0:11:10.05,CHS,,0,0,0,,怎么压得四分五裂了%%65311\N{\rENG}Is it necessary?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:21.82,0:11:24.53,CHS,,0,0,0,,哇%%65281好棒啊%%65281\N{\rENG}It's great!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:28.92,0:11:31.46,CHS,,0,0,0,,有了这个月光宝盒\N{\rENG}We needn't scare of Qingxia%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:31.76,0:11:34.72,CHS,,0,0,0,,以后就不怕被青霞姐姐追杀了\N{\rENG}since we've got the box%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:35.14,0:11:39.23,CHS,,0,0,0,,出来呀%%65281鬼鬼祟祟的%%65292害羞呀你%%65311\N{\rENG}Come out! Are you really this shy?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:41.61,0:11:45.41,CHS,,0,0,0,,- 这个月光宝盒呢… - 我的%%65281\N{\rENG}- this Box is... - It's me!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:45.49,0:11:48.58,CHS,,0,0,0,,我说过了%%65292这里所有东西都是我的\N{\rENG}I've said that all things here are mine%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:48.58,0:11:49.54,CHS,,0,0,0,,你想干嘛%%65311\N{\rENG}What do you want?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:49.67,0:11:50.63,CHS,,0,0,0,,没有…\N{\rENG}Nothing...%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:51.09,0:11:51.80,CHS,,0,0,0,,我听说你要走\N{\rENG}I've heard that you wanna go%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:52.00,0:11:53.46,CHS,,0,0,0,,能不能带我一起走啊%%65311\N{\rENG}Can you bring me with you?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:53.59,0:11:54.97,CHS,,0,0,0,,你也被人追杀啊%%65311\N{\rENG}Are you also chased after by someone?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:54.97,0:11:56.34,CHS,,0,0,0,,我赶着去救人哪\N{\rENG}I'm going to save someone%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:56.64,0:11:57.35,CHS,,0,0,0,,救谁啊%%65311\N{\rENG}Save whom?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:57.68,0:11:58.68,CHS,,0,0,0,,救我娘子\N{\rENG}Save my wife%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:11:59.02,0:12:01.35,CHS,,0,0,0,,就是白晶晶啊%%65292你认识她的\N{\rENG}It's Pak Jing Jing. You know her%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:01.56,0:12:02.15,CHS,,0,0,0,,不认识\N{\rENG}I don't know her%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:02.44,0:12:04.24,CHS,,0,0,0,,我知道%%65292不过你很快就会认识她了\N{\rENG}I know that. But you'll know her soon%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:04.53,0:12:05.61,CHS,,0,0,0,,因为她将会做你的徒弟\N{\rENG}Because she'll be your disciple%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:05.87,0:12:07.07,CHS,,0,0,0,,还有这个宝盒呢…\N{\rENG}And this Box...%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:07.41,0:12:07.83,CHS,,0,0,0,,我的%%65281\N{\rENG}It's mine!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:08.16,0:12:08.70,CHS,,0,0,0,,我知道\N{\rENG}I know that%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:09.04,0:12:10.46,CHS,,0,0,0,,不过其实呢%%65292是我给你\N{\rENG}But in fact, I gave you this%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:10.71,0:12:12.80,CHS,,0,0,0,,然后你再…在那个时候交给我\N{\rENG}Then, you gave me back at that time%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:13.05,0:12:14.51,CHS,,0,0,0,,那么才会有我回到这里来\N{\rENG}So I come back and%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:14.72,0:12:16.18,CHS,,0,0,0,,然后又交还给你\N{\rENG}give it back to you again now%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:16.51,0:12:17.39,CHS,,0,0,0,,你明白吗%%65311\N{\rENG}Do you ynderstand?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:17.68,0:12:21.48,CHS,,0,0,0,,- 我明白了%%65311你神经病 - 对呀\N{\rENG}- Yes, you're craZy - Yes%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:23.52,0:12:25.15,CHS,,0,0,0,,反正你一定要带我走就对了\N{\rENG}And you have to bring me with you%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:25.36,0:12:26.32,CHS,,0,0,0,,我为什么要对你那么好%%65311\N{\rENG}Why need I do so good to you?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:26.61,0:12:27.62,CHS,,0,0,0,,因为你是我的主人哪\N{\rENG}This is because you're my master%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:27.91,0:12:29.75,CHS,,0,0,0,,你走了我一个人留在这里有什么意思啊\N{\rENG}It's meaningless if you leave me here%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:30.08,0:12:31.16,CHS,,0,0,0,,真的吗%%65311\N{\rENG}Really?%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:32.00,0:12:32.83,CHS,,0,0,0,,坐\N{\rENG}Sit down%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:33.63,0:12:34.46,CHS,,0,0,0,,地下\N{\rENG}Ground%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:36.51,0:12:38.26,CHS,,0,0,0,,手\N{\rENG}Give me your hand%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:39.81,0:12:42.73,CHS,,0,0,0,,乖啊%%65281待会呢给你买件新衣服\N{\rENG}I'll buy a new clothes%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:43.06,0:12:44.52,CHS,,0,0,0,,回去见你娘子\N{\rENG}for you later%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:45.53,0:12:46.19,CHS,,0,0,0,,叫啊%%65281\N{\rENG}Bark!%%00010Dialogue: 0,0:12:46.40,0:12:47.03,CHS,,0,0,0,,汪…\N{\rENG}Wow!%%00010Dialogue:
